text: Green Fire is a 1954 American adventure drama movie directed by Andrew Marton and was based on the 1942 memoir of the same name by Peter W. Rainer. It stars Stewart Granger, Grace Kelly, John Ericson, Paul Douglas, Murvyn Vye, Rico Alaniz, Nacho Galindo and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1954 drama movies Category:1954 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Andrew Marton
title: Green Fire
